title: The Michigan Maneuver with Tudor Dixon and Alfredo Ortiz
itunes:title: The Michigan Maneuver with Tudor Dixon and Alfredo Ortiz
description:
Four months ago, Republicans trailed 35 points in the Michigan gubernatorial race. Now, Tudor Dixon has closed within the margin of error on the polls. She joins Charlie to talk about her debate win and how Democrats have alienated both Muslim and Christian parents with their outrageous education agenda. Plus, Alfredo Ortiz of Job Creators Network joins to discuss whether the Biden Admin's inflation figure is accurate or a gross underestimate.

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
